mapper.insert: insert into reration_info (u_id,r_u_id, `status`, creat_time, modify_time) values (#{uId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{rUId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select u_id, r_u_id, `status`, creat_time, modify_time from reration_info
select u_id, r_u_id, `status`, creat_time, modify_time from reration_info where u_id= #{uId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
